channel.title: Media/News references
channel.description:
This should be added to the website in a visible place so users could better understand the features, differences, advantages of Whonix. It's also a good marketing tactic.
It should have a list of urls including titles, sorted by date. Perhaps with some small excerpts. (Maybe prism-break could be included)
Probably one of the best examples is this: http://www.techradar.com/news/software/operating-systems/which-linux-distro-is-best-for-protecting-your-privacy--1192771
which compares the distros very well in different aspects
Some implementations:
https://www.torproject.org/press/press.html.en https://tails.boum.org/press/index.en.html

item.title: Media/News references
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This would be desirable!

There is https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Security_Reviews_and_Feedback and in particular https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Security_Reviews_and_Feedback#Press - but no one of the current Whonix team can take extra tasks.

If you wish we can create a dedicated https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Press (or so) page. Would you be interested to maintain that page?

Read full topic
